summary: Based on my own RP character, Ramona will help your character on it's adventures
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/240x101q90/19/yeyl.png[/img]
[i]"The name's Ramona, from Windhelm. My parents and my little sisters died during an attack and now I'm travelling all alone.
For 6 years I've been in this goddamn Orphanage in Riften, Talos be praised I managed to get out of this Hell. Few years
later, here I am, seeking for adventure from outsiders or locals..."[/i]
[img]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/240x125q90/17/h37t.png[/img]
Dead Man's Drink, Falkreath
[img]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/222x176q90/713/75hp.png[/img]
*add stats*
[img]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/240x95q90/62/fmv1.png[/img]
Installation (manual):

1. Put "Ramona.esp" in your data folder
2. Put the "Ramona" folder from the "meshes" folder to your "meshes" folder following this way: meshes/actors/characters
3. Do the same as the 2nd step but in your "textures" folder

Uninstallation (manual):

1. Delete "Ramona.esp" from your data folder
2. Delete the "Ramona" folder from the "meshes" folder following this way: meshes/actors/characters
3.Do the same as the 2nd step but in your "textures" folder

[b]I recommend using Nexus Mod Manager for both the installation and uninstallation [/b]

[img]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/240x161q90/802/2k5m.png[/img]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE-[/url] by Caliente

Big thanks to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951//?]Natilde[/url] for her amazing [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25673//?]tutorial[/url]
